title: Google Stadia adding Cities: Skylines, Overcooked, and Golf With Your Friends starting in April
content:
In one of the more exciting additions to its library in quite some time, Google has today announced that Stadia will be adding Cities: Skylines, Overcooked, and Golf With Your Friends starting in April 2022.

moreâ€¦

The post Google Stadia adding Cities: Skylines, Overcooked, and Golf With Your Friends starting in April appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has announced three new games coming to Stadia soon, with Overcooked, Cities: Skylines, and Golf With Your Friends on their way.
